nodes.name: FakeEFCS
nodes.title: Impossible Gates Pass
nodes.description: The randomizer devs won't let us have any fun, so they won't let us have the EFCS under normal circumstances. This opens gates that require it instead.

nodes.name: KeyBag
nodes.title: Key Bag
nodes.description: I put all of your identical keys into a sack to keep them organized. Press Confirm to check them out.

nodes.name: Wardrobe
nodes.title: Wardrobe
nodes.description: Nobody's got time to go ALL the way to the changing tent. Press Confirm if you want to change.

nodes.name: Potions
nodes.title: Potions
nodes.description: I know a guy who knows a guy who deals in rafts. Get me enough of these and I could be...persuaded to get one from him.

nodes.name: DKEYS_PillowFort
nodes.title: Pillow Fort Keys
nodes.description: Surprised these are allowed, they seem like a safety hazard.

nodes.name: DKEYS_SandCastle
nodes.title: Sand Castle Keys
nodes.description: Probably the most useless keys on this island.

nodes.name: DKEYS_ArtExhibit
nodes.title: Art Exhibit Keys
nodes.description: You can actually reach the boss without any of these if you've got Dynamite and Fire Sword.

nodes.name: DKEYS_TrashCave
nodes.title: Trash Cave Keys
nodes.description: Use the shortcut near the beginning to save a key if you can.

nodes.name: DKEYS_FloodedBasement
nodes.title: Flooded Basement Keys
nodes.description: You can save a key to reach the crayon chest with the right items.

nodes.name: DKEYS_PotassiumMine
nodes.title: Potassium Mine Keys
nodes.description: I would have replaced the lock by the boss with a combat door, personally.

nodes.name: DKEYS_BoilingGrave
nodes.title: Boiling Grave Keys
nodes.description: Huh, you can't do very much in this dungeon without some keys.

nodes.name: DKEYS_GrandLibrary
nodes.title: Grand Library Keys
nodes.description: With so many keys, there better be some very valueable loot here.

nodes.name: DKEYS_SunkenLabyrinth
nodes.title: Sunken Labyrinth Keys
nodes.description: Imagine getting lost here, there's barely any branching paths.

nodes.name: DKEYS_MachineFortress
nodes.title: Machine Fortress Keys
nodes.description: Why do these exist? Just replace them with buttons.

nodes.name: DKEYS_DarkHypostyle
nodes.title: Dark Hypostyle Keys
nodes.description: So many options. How are you going to use these? No extra key anymore though.

nodes.name: DKEYS_TombOfSimulacrum
nodes.title: Tomb of Simulacrum Keys
nodes.description: Really? Ten keys but no options on where to use them?

nodes.name: DKEYS_DreamDynamite
nodes.title: Syncope Keys
nodes.description: They aren't drenched in ectoplasm, thankfully.

nodes.name: DKEYS_DreamFireChain
nodes.title: Antigram Keys
nodes.description: These keys are symmetrical down the middle. Just like all the other keys.

nodes.name: DKEYS_DreamIce
nodes.title: Bottomless Tower Keys
nodes.description: They're cold to the touch. I feel some strange forboding from them.

nodes.name: DKEYS_DreamAll
nodes.title: Quietus Keys
nodes.description: You don't need these to reach the boss. They only unlock one location each, lame.

nodes.name: outfitDefault
nodes.title: Ittle Dew 2
nodes.description: You know, I wasn't sure about the jump to 3D, but you pulled it off pretty well. I'm fine staying flat though, thank you very much.

nodes.name: outfitTippsie
nodes.title: Tippsie
nodes.description: I appreciate the flattery, but less of a fan of the wig I have to wear...

nodes.name: outfitOriginal
nodes.title: Ittle Dew 1
nodes.description: Personally, I think you look better with short hair.

nodes.name: outfitJenny
nodes.title: Jenny Dew
nodes.description: Huh, with this you almost look as intimidating as Jenny Fox. Perhaps consider getting an axe?

nodes.name: outfitSwim
nodes.title: Swimsuit
nodes.description: Perfect for the beach episode. When are the devs adding swimming?

nodes.name: outfitArmor
nodes.title: Tiger Jenny Armor
nodes.description: Tiger Jenny may have been the previous owner, but legend has it that this armor once belonged to a fierce diety of some kind.

nodes.name: outfitCard
nodes.title: Little Dude
nodes.description: I can't stand card games, big cities, nighttime, or the number 2.

nodes.name: outfitDelinquent
nodes.title: Delinquent
nodes.description: Putting the "Fashion" in "Fashionably Late."

nodes.name: outfitApaFrog
nodes.title: Apathetic Frog
nodes.description: Meh.

nodes.name: outfitThatGuy
nodes.title: That Guy
nodes.description: Those shadowey shapes in The Promised Remedy...do you think those were souls? What do you think happens to us when we wear this?

nodes.name: outfitJennyBerry
nodes.title: Jenny Berry
nodes.description: Probably not the best time to bring up that I have a phobia of being turned into a flying ice cream cone?
